Class Member

java.lang.Object
org.cybooks.User
org.cybooks.Member
public class Member extends User
Represents a member user in the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • Member

      public Member(int id, String lastname, String firstname, String email, Date inscriptionDate, String state, Date birthday, String phone, String sex, Date block_till)
      Constructor to initialize a Member object.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the member.
      lastname - The last name of the member.
      firstname - The first name of the member.
      email - The email address of the member.
      inscriptionDate - The date of inscription for the member.
      state - The state of the member's account.
      birthday - The birthday of the member.
      phone - The phone number of the member.
      sex - The gender of the member.
      block_till - The date until which the member is blocked.
